# Class 1 {#class1}

## Activities **before class 1**

Note: this is a repeat of the [activities mentioned in Importance of RDM](https://estherplomp.github.io/TNW-RDM-101/02-Importance-of-RDM.html#activities)

-   Watch the presentations on 'Why is RDM important'? (*10 minutes*)
-   Read [@markowetz2015]: Five selfish reasons to work reproducibly OR [Watch the presentation](https://youtu.be/1Y_oIjlH-yg?t=355) (*50 minutes*)
-   Create a GitHub issue (see [Assignment 1](https://estherplomp.github.io/TNW-RDM-101/03-Assignment-GitHub-1.html)) (*10-30 minutes*)

## **Class 1 (*120 minutes*)**

-   Introductions
-   Discuss why RDM is important to you
    -   Do you find the horror stories or the benefits more convincing?
    -   Do you have a horror story to share?
-   Introduction Data Flow Map assignment
-   Check GitHub Issue
-   Importance of Documentation
